ygData.subject: Re: Okay....let see....
ygData.msgSnippet: Truly, I think this is the first time I ve ever seen or heard of a power gamer putting down players for Role Playing. Both High Elves and Erudites tend
ygData.messageBody:
<OOC>
Truly, I think this is the first time I've ever seen or heard of a power
gamer putting down players for Role Playing. Both High Elves and Erudites
tend to be a bit stuck up, and when players of those races decide to add
some spice to their messages with RP then they have a perfect right to. I
hate to get UO involved in an EQ discussion list, but I feel one of the
major downfalls of that game was the fact that there were so few RPers. WQ
has been vastly diffrent in that respect, and I'd be thankful if you stopped
trying to scare them off! Quite frankly, I found those messages to be
entertaining as well as to possess pertinant info. I agree that the many
messages that are recieved via this mailing list can get a bit spammy.. but
if you don't like them simply unsubscribe. Okay, now I'm done with the rant
and can go on to more cheerful subjects...
<OOC>
<IC>
Since introductions seem to be the order of the day (except of course
for our dear magic users who seem to be more intrested in flinging mud and
racial prejudices than spells as is normal) I'd like to introduce myself. I
am Madoc, and I am in the sixth level of service to Quellious the Tranquil.
(OOC> 6th level Monk) Unlike so many others, I judge no man or beast before
contact. I will fight only those who spend their lives seeking to destroy
others. Currently I stay close to my home town, Freeport. I can usually be
found in the dessert men have labeled Ro, but I have decided that this is
not the place that I might find my Center, so one day I plan to travel the
world. Should we one day meet in our travels and I not recognize you, feel
free to stop me and start up a bit of conversation, as additional wisdom can
always be gained from the meeting of two travellers.

Madoc
